title: Sonnet 90 - function of the final couplet

content.prompt: What is the function of the final couplet (lines 13â€“14)?

choices.label: It explains why the friend should hurt the speaker now.
It comments on the speaker's change of heart.
It describes the reasons for the speaker's behavior.
It suggests that the speaker's woes are largely self-created.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
